# Transparency Token 

## Issued Token with Receipts

### Protected Header

~~~ json
{
  "alg": "ES384",
  "b64": false,
  "crit": [
    "b64"
  ],
  "kid": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0#9QKl7Gb4qJ3OhaTeuv2n-gq944tqrvgtE2670IWq4m8",
  "typ": "application/cool+jose",
  "cty": "text/plain; charset=utf-8",
  "jwt_claims": {
    "cnf": {
      "kid": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8#ISf12HZ9NqDIYQixGflRPtcE-C5vbmg_OajKCbwU0yk"
    },
    "iat": 1700763326,
    "_sd_hash_alg": "sha-256",
    "iss": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0",
    "sub": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8"
  }
}
~~~

### Unprotected Header

~~~ json
{
  "receipts": [
    "..qutw14nPdnb98UYkxRDpxBBq-O9VDuwvCJrUiZGnkMYoAKnX9G82KRYoGz4YGNl_VQy-oCjnltLbqg57mE2LAZPRl7J9qV2bBWjm0EBaP9vDunEjid2HCLytlm2SXrQr~eyJwcm9vZnMiOnsiaW5jbHVzaW9uIjpbIlcxMCJdfX0"
  ]
}
~~~

### JSON

~~~ text
{
  "protected": "",
  "unprotected": {
    "receipts": [
      "..qutw14nPdnb98UYkxRDpxBBq-O9VDuwvCJrUiZGnkMYoAKnX9G82KRYoGz4YGNl_VQy-oCjnltLbqg57mE2LAZPRl7J9qV2bBWjm0EBaP9vDunEjid2HCLytlm2SXrQr~eyJwcm9vZnMiOnsiaW5jbHVzaW9uIjpbIlcxMCJdfX0"
    ]
  },
  "payload": null,
  "signature": "6FAEeH4AmwBhZbF6vdk3lGRZWbo2rLSsOWLs4VAGgDnIqb7HaIvLRsV0Z9PGdrcZZsc202zyO41D3R6trP0uaDk-B3RvqkPVAs9kCQmX-5O9muoA4Hu_bw9WV7EAabKG"
}
~~~

### Compact

~~~ text
..6FAEeH4AmwBhZbF6vdk3lGRZWbo2rLSsOWLs4VAGgDnIqb7HaIvLRsV0Z9PGdrcZZsc202zyO41D3R6trP0uaDk-B3RvqkPVAs9kCQmX-5O9muoA4Hu_bw9WV7EAabKG~-ZXlKd2NtOXZabk1pT25zaWFXNWpiSFZ6YVc5dUlqcGJJbGN4TUNKZGZYMCJdfQ
~~~
